site.title: Soda Marcela - Quepos, Costa Rica
site.description: Soda Marcela, a taste of Costa Rica in Quepos. Since 1988.

about.title: Welcome to our home
about.body: At Soda Marcela, we have been lovingly serving authentic Costa Rican food for over 30 years. Located in the heart of Quepos, we are a corner of tradition and flavor where every dish tells a story. Pura Vida!

services.title: Craving at home?
services.body: Don't worry! We offer Express Service so you can enjoy the taste of Soda Marcela wherever you are in the Quepos area.
